title: The Best Ideas in Bad Games
description: Sometimes the worst games do have some redeeming qualities. This week, the gang looks at the best game mechanics, unique story ideas, console technology integration featured in sub-par releases over the years.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
